item.title: Migrating From Blogger
item.description: My previous (old) blog was hosted on Blogger and was called About 80 minutes. There is a reasonable amount of content on that blog that I wanted to host on this hugo site. This post covers my journey from taking posts from Blogger and hosting them on GitHub.
